edu.nyu.library.primo.plugins.enrichment
Class HttpEnrichmentPlugin

java.lang.Object
  edu.nyu.library.primo.plugins.NyuPlugin
      edu.nyu.library.primo.plugins.enrichment.NyuEnrichmentPlugin
          edu.nyu.library.primo.plugins.enrichment.HttpEnrichmentPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.exlibris.primo.api.plugins.enrichment.EnrichmentPlugin
public abstract class HttpEnrichmentPlugin
extends NyuEnrichmentPlugin

Abstract class for enriching Primo via an HTTP Response. Subclasses should implement enrich based on the Content response from getResponse() or postResponse() with their specific logic for processing responses.

Author:
Scot Dalton
